customProperties.armorEffects: When a creature hits you with a melee weapon attack, the attacker takes 1 piercing damage.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Weapon Attacks made with this weapon deal Slashing damage instead of their normal damage type.
customProperties.additionalEffects: When crafting or repairing an item made from Razorwood, the time to craft it is reduced by half.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: When a creature hits you with a melee weapon attack, the attacker takes 1 piercing damage.
Weapon Effects: Weapon Attacks made with this weapon deal Slashing damage instead of their normal damage type.
Additional Effects: When crafting or repairing an item made from Razorwood, the time to craft it is reduced by half.
